task.title: Find Word Meanings
task.shortdesc: Learn how to understand new words by looking at the words around them.

taskbody.context: You will see hard words on the GED test. These steps will help you understand them without a dictionary.

step.cmd: Find the word you don't know
step.info: Circle the word and read its whole sentence.
The sentences before and after often explain the word.
step.stepxmp: If nearby sentences talk about disagreements and conflicts, "contentious" probably means there was a lot of disagreement.

step.info:
Look for words like:
means, is, are (definition clues)
like, such as (example clues)
but, however (contrast clues)

step.cmd: Try the meaning in the sentence
step.info: Replace the hard word with your guess to see if it makes sense.

taskbody.result: You can now figure out what most new words mean by looking at how they're used.
